description: Managed public firmware release cycles for the HaLowLink router and evaluation kit consumer products.

Developed a range testing tool and used it to lead field demonstrations for tier-1 customers across multiple US locations, demonstrating the world record (legal) 15+ km range and 3.8 Mbps throughput on 4 MHz channels
Assisted in the development of a mainline 900 MHz 802.11ah Linux driver and integrated it into existing OpenWrt products for customer evaluation.
Provided technical support to ODM customers and internal teams for hardware bringup and software integration
Developed, tested, and integrated early prototype readout electronics for a spaceborne LiDAR 6U CubeSat.
Managed the design update and manufacture of the NVIDIA Jetson based Spiral Blue Space Edge One computer V1.8 iteration.
Implemented software and provided technical support for the University of Sydney's Waratah Seed, Toliman and ISAM missions as well as the federal government's Ghost Nets initiative.
Performed ticket-based full stack development on the SaaS cloud platform for feature development and bug fixing.
Setup a secure Azure-hosted OpenAI resource and integrated it with an SQL database to power a frontend dialog which generated SQL queries and trend analysis based on user input.
Assembled and serviced electrical and mechanical robotic targets for defence customers.
Assisted in the development, documentation and testing of a new battery management system.
Automated various processes for tier 2 automotive manufacturers throughout the Midwest.
Developed fully automated OEM manufacturing cell with computer vision system and electromagnetic tooling for bulk pallet unloading.
Reduced assembly burden by introducing 3D printed alternatives for non-structural parts.
Designed and manufactured robot add-on products such as screwing systems and cabling kits.
Taught EPSON robot programming classes for local customers.
